abstract: The rapper, actress and "Chicago" star hosted a previous talk show, "The Queen Latifah Show," which ran from 1999 to 2001.
snippet: The rapper, actress and "Chicago" star hosted a previous talk show, "The Queen Latifah Show," which ran from 1999 to 2001.
lead_paragraph: Having dispensed the indispensable advice that when you're good to mama, mama's good to you, Queen Latifah, the rapper, actress and star of the 2002 film version of "Chicago," will become a full-time purveyor of life advice and inspiration on a new syndicated daytime talk show. Sony Pictures Television said on Monday that it will produce the as-yet-untitled show with Flavor Unit Entertainment, the production company of Queen Latifah and Shakim Compere, and Overbrook Entertainment, the company of James Lassiter and Will Smith (who in 1991 gave Queen Latifah one of her earliest screen appearances on his sitcom "The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air").

headline.main: Queen Latifah Will Host New Talk Show Planned for 2013
